column4: hey everyone, is anyone familiar with a program DVD Catalyst 2.4, if so is there a ubuntu alternative???
what is the prog's function?
IC
I don't use PDAs; I just use dvdrip to convert DVD format to AVIs.  Don't know more than that really on this topic
I hate windows -- no  :-)  That is linux, which is the channel you are in right now =)
it depends on what output format you want I expect (and you haven't mentioned that so far I think)
definitely...
DVD->AVI is akin to something like WAV->MP3
OK :-)  There are others too (like acidrip) but I found dvdrip to be quite nice (sane defaults) but just a bit fussy to configure initially (no biggie tho, just a little time and patience)
once it is setup it's pretty nice
it seems like a small program which is good I'm no dial up! lol
start the d/l and go to bed, it'll be done in the morning or before ;-)
I used to dist-upgrade that way and it worked just fine :-D
I know, it just reminded me of my dialup daze ;-)
yw
1:15am here <yawn>
it doesn't like copy protected DVD's
you will need that decryption routine prog...
libccs...  can't remember the full name - anyone?
it may be 'libdvdcss2'
you need extra codecs that's all...
